pages.text: $(bred)Pumpkin Zombie$() is a Normal Zombie with Pumpkin's head, $(m)but you can still see its head$().$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)180$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will $(bred)heal 20 hp itself each attack$(). When it's in water, it will wear a $(byellow)ducky tube$() to speed up.
